question: Who among the following authors wrote "Tabuqat-i-Akbari"?
explanation: Khwajah Nizamuddin Ahmed wrote \"Tabuqat-i-Akbari\" in the reign of Akbar, it was completed in 1593 AD. The book compiled the history of India from 986 AD to 38th year of Mughal emperor Akbar\'s reign. It is a very important source for the history of the Sayyid and Lodi Sultans.
